comments.text:
Hi Tyler! I don't know if you will even see this, but I just wanted to tell 
you something. The first time I saw you was on Youtubers react, and I've 
seen you there a million times now, just continously falling in love with 
your bright personality, without really taking the time to stop by your 
channel. I'm going through a really tough time at the moment, and was 
sitting around feeling sorry for myself when I once again, saw you on 
Youtubers react. So I clicked your channel, which is the best choice I've 
made in a while now, because my tough time suddenly caught a little ray of 
sunshine! It's impossible not to smile when you smile, so I just want to 
thank you. Because you were the first one to really make me smile in a 
while :) Please keep on being everything you are, AND: you just gained a 
loyal subscriber and follower <3﻿
